Generation VII.Sun: One of the dangerous Ultra Beasts, it has been spotted running across the land at terrific speeds.
Generation VII.Moon: One of the Ultra Beasts. It refuses to touch anything, perhaps because it senses some uncleanness in this world.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: A life-form that lives in another world, its body is thin and supple, but it also possesses great power.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Although it's alien to this world and a danger here, it's apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.

Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure ) ( Only one , requires unlocking the They Came From The Ultra Beyond! adventure)
